src.huffenc module¶

src.huffenc.decode(path, path_out)[source]¶

Note

Complexity: O(n)

src.huffenc.encode(path_in, path_out)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • path_in (String) – Path of file to encode
  • path_out (String) – Path of encoded file to create

Note

O(n) - Composition of called functions

src.huffenc.encode_string(string_in, code_map)[source]¶

Maps input string to output using the generated code map

Parameters:
  • string_in (string) – String of input bytes
  • code_map (dict) – Huffman map
Returns:

string_out – Encoded String
Return type:

string

Note

O(n) - Must iterate over the entire input.

src.huffenc.generate_code_length_map(huffman_tree, tree_depth=0, code_length_map={})[source]¶

For each side of the huffman_tree, recursively generate the length of the huffman_tree to that point

Parameters:
  • huffman_tree (dict) – Nested list of lists of symbols
  • tree_depth (int) – Depth in Huffman Tree (defaults to 0)
  • code_length_map (dict) – Intermediate from symbol to code length (defaults to {} )
Returns:

code_length_map – Mapping from symbol to code length (defaults to {} )
Return type:

dict

Note

O(1) - Huffman_tree depth is bounded at 255

src.huffenc.generate_code_lengths(huffman_tree)[source]¶

Generates a mapping of symbol to code length.

Parameters:huffman_tree (dict) – Nested list of lists of symbols
Returns:code_length_map – Mapping from symbol to code length
Return type:dict

Note

O(1) - Huffman_tree size is bounded

Note

Code length is equivalent to tree depth

src.huffenc.generate_frequency_table(string_in)[source]¶

Generates a frequency table of the bytes from an input string

Parameters:string_in (String) – String to generate frequency of
Returns:freq – Frequency mapping of bytes in string_in
Return type:dict

Note

O(n) - Iterating over entire string

src.huffenc.generate_symbol_mapping(code_length_map, reverse=False)[source]¶

Generates Canonical Huffman Code from code lengths

Parameters:
  • code_length_map (dict) – Mapping from symbol to code length
  • reverse (bool) – Determines whether mapping is from symbol to codeword or inverse
Returns:

canonical_code – Mapping from symbol to codeword or inverse
Return type:

dict

Note

O(1) - Code size is bounded by 256 Bytes

src.huffenc.get_default_path(path_in, encode_file)[source]¶

Automatically generates output path if not specified

Parameters:
  • path_in (string) – path to input file
  • encode_file (bool) – encoding or decoding
Returns:

path_out – auto-generated path to output
Return type:

string

Note

O(1) by inspection

src.huffenc.get_minimum_frequency_pair(freq_table)[source]¶

Get two min values from dictionary, O(1) since len(freq_table)<=256

Parameters:freq_table (dict) – Mapping from symbol to frequency
Returns:minimum_frequency_pair – Pair of symbols with minimum frequency
Return type:tuple

Note

O(1) - Bounded by 256 bytes

src.huffenc.increment_table(freq_table)[source]¶

Move from table ‘s_n’ to ‘s_n+1’

Parameters:freq_table (dict) – Mapping from symbol to frequency
Returns:freq_table – Augmented frequency table
Return type:dict

Note

O(1) - Bounded by 256 bytes
